channel.title: [317] Pk Server!
channel.description:
*****?
This has got the Source and the Client. ( You Need Hamatchi )
Steps to set it up:
Download the link (You need winrar)
When downloaded extract both files to your desktop
Open sources and click on run.bat and leave that running
Now open Client and run Launch v7.3
When you got hamatchi join my network and ill explain what to do to join my server User: gay pkin serber Pass: runescape
OR
When the client has loaded in the top corner click file then change server and type the Ip you have in Hamatchi
